Project Jakarta

22 Jun 1999

In an unprecedented deal, Sun Microsystems has agreed to release the source code to their Servlet and JavaServer Pages reference implementation to the Apache Group. In turn, the Apache Group will release the source code to web developers everywhere under the Apache license.

Check out the complete article.\n
